There is a way you can know to know the self, to know each aspect of consciousness, to understand the chakras, and to be able to recognize the consciousness of those things that are precious to you, will allow you to confidently say that your unification with your loved one or loved ones in this new plane of existence is not an illusion. It is real. You have succeeded in achieving immortality with awareness. That awareness is great power. It is the greatest power. It is the ability to achieve godhood. And that is the goal of the Agor, to become a God.
